name: Forest (hazzza)
description:
Description

Stranded in the Forest.

Survive the Forest.

Explore the Forest.

Escape the Forest.

Forest

Forest is an online multiplayer game about crafting, building and many other things!

  • With support for multiplayer, co-operate with your friends
  • Disrespect nature !
  • you stupid horse
  • Cut down trees and extract natural resources to create tools and weapons
  • Crafting of a Stone Pickaxe

This game is in development!

That means you, the player, can influence the course of the project! 

Please do leave feedback, ideas or bugs in the discussion board, as it would be really helpful. I will publish devlogs quite frequently.
